creator: rmann@latencyzero.com
text:
I downloaded the 1.2 beta4, and it appears that it's missing the necessary XML parser 
libraries (parser.jar, et. al) that should be in /build/lib. In any event, I'd prefer to simply 
use the XML parser already available to me in Tomcat (the environment in which I use 
log4j).

So, bug: missing files from beta download (parser.jar, jaxp.jar).

Real bug: Is it possible to enhance log4j in such a way that either it can find any 
appropriate XML parser, or I can call the configurator with information about the XML 
parser to use?

TIA

The removal of parser.jar jaxp.jar is intentional. The answer to the second 
quesiton is no. The JAXP is made exactly for that purpose.
